entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Hay River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:38 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -34.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hay River/Merlyn Carter Airport 8:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -34.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Dewpoint: -38.5°C
Wind: N 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 27.
